div.p: 2nd Annual Northeast PHP Technical Conference Announced!

This yearâ€™s Northeast PHP Conference will once again be held in Boston, MA from August 16 to 18. The call for speakers is currently open and will close at the end of April, with speaker selection being determined by the end of May. This year we are adding a day to the front of the weekend for half-day workshops, so please feel free to make those proposals as well. For more information:
